July 19, 1913 D Rochdale Contest
Rochdale Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Rochdale Annual Brass Band Festival rochdale-contest
Test Piece Contest
The Bohemian Girl (arr. Rimmer)
Greenhill, Rochdale Best cornet - William Pollard (Haslingden) Best trombone - Woodhead (Shaw). Best euphonium - G.F.Bedforth (Nelson). 7 bands competed
Sept. 30, 2012, 1:36 p.m. Nov. 19, 2020, 12:16 p.m.
1 Shaw Band William Halliwell
2 Hebden Bridge Band William Halliwell
3 Nelson Old William Halliwell
4 Slaithwaite Band Benjamin Lodge
5 Haslingden Borough Band William Pollard
Unknown Result Shawclough & Spotland J. Thompson
Unknown Result Briercliffe Prize Brass Band Peter Fairhurst
